import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { TextField, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Axios from 'axios'; export default function EditBook() { const [loadedBook, setLoadedBook] = useState([]) const bookId = useParams().bookId; console.log(bookId) useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/bookBlog/book/${bookId}`) .then(response => { const books = response.data.books; setLoadedBook(books) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) console.log(loadedBook) return(

Edit Book

) }
